name: tnt
description: Team New Tab - A customizable dashboard for Chrome's new tab page

scripts.build: rm -rf dist/ && mkdir -p dist && terser newtab.js --compress --mangle -o dist/newtab.js && terser background.js --compress --mangle -o dist/background.js && terser config.js --compress --mangle -o dist/config.js && cp styles.css newtab.html manifest.json tnt_logo.png dist/ && cp -r icons dist/
scripts.package: npm run build && cd dist && zip -r ../tnt-extension-v$(node -p "require('../package.json').version").zip .
scripts.dev: echo 'Development mode - use files directly for Chrome extension development'
